name: gerrit
description: Gerrit provides web based code review and repository management for the Git version control system.
preInstallNotes: Pre-install note: Gerrit requires an external database. Please ensure a database is available to this Gerrit instance, and that it has been configured either in the DC/OS UI or the DC/OS CLI prior to proceeding.
postUninstallNotes: Gerrit has been uninstalled. Note that any data persisted to an external database remains intact. Please manually remove that data from the database if you wish to do so.
